Package game.risk.view

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
game.risk.view.GameView
public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
Return the report of the game, fetches players, the countries attacked and errors.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tejash, Lynn, Jatin, Adityo
